result.reason: Config corruption (confCons.xml goes null) reported on very old mRemoteNG version (1.77.1) and Windows 10 1803 with no recent confirmation; related to #1031 save failure but no logs or crash data provided to diagnose root cause.
result.approach: Needs user to retest on latest build and provide startup logs; likely related to #1031 null attribute serialization bug which corrupts confCons.xml to zero-byte on save, then app fails to open on next launch.

attempts.raw_output:
Based on the analysis, this is a long-standing config file corruption bug related to #1031 (null values during XML serialization). The issue is from 2019, on very old versions, with no recent activity.
